channel.title: Some sort of waiting?
channel.description:
Very simple, I need some sort of alarm or pauze in the game, for the fishing thing, i need to let the player wait for a while, about 4 seconds, is there such a command/function for some sort of standby phase
Thanks:)

item.title: Some sort of waiting?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:233648”]Thread.sleep(4000); //Pause for 4 seconds

[size=2pt]I’m so evil[/size][/quote]

Haha, nice phrase in small text.

Read full topic

item.title: Some sort of waiting?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“swodlayer, post:2, topic:233640”]Ye but is that for the whole game, the players and all the monsters stop moving and performing actions, or just some sort of standby?

EDIT:
Plus the fact that i get an error: "unreported exception java.lang.InterruptedException; must be declared or declared to be thrown
Thread.sleep(4000);
^[/quote]
Catch the possibly thrown exception. That will pause the current thread, as it is a static method.

Read full topic
